author: Phil
content:
Willi,

Sharks?
Why do you think the boat crew didn’t swim out to her?

author: Irwin Bryan
content:
Wow, what a story. Loved the play on words!
lucky girl!

author: William Allan Sheppard Smith
content: Great and positive news story. This world needs more of that:)

author: Joe Arrington
content: The Captain of the ferry along with his crew should be commended. I know from experience that it is no easy task to maneuver a vessel of that size in that kind of situation. Thanks for a job well done!

author: Willy
content: comendable rescue. Thankfully the unicorn was large and made it easy to detect the child. Glad no sharks took interest in her.
